pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Downscaling Toolkit for Climate Change Scenario using Non Parametric Quantile Mapping // Conducts statistical downscaling of daily CMIP5 (Coupled Model Intercomparison Project 5) climate change scenario data at a station level using empirical quantile mapping method by Jaepil Cho et al. (2016) doi:10.1002/ird.2035.
